chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: O sing unto the LORD a new song: sing unto the LORD, all the earth.
items.plainText: O sing unto the LORD a new song: sing unto the LORD, all the earth.

items.text: Sing unto the LORD, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.
items.plainText: Sing unto the LORD, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.

items.text: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.
items.plainText: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.

items.text: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
items.plainText: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.

items.text: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.
items.plainText: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.

items.text: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
items.plainText: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.

items.text: Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
items.plainText: Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.

items.text: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.
items.plainText: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.

items.text: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.
items.plainText: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.

items.text: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
items.plainText: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.

items.text: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.
items.plainText: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.

items.text: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
items.plainText: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice

items.text: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
items.plainText: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
